description: Isaac Hardy"Hardcore"Ht: 6'0" WT: 165lbs Season W/L record (0-0)Connor Patricks"The Pulverizer"Ht: 5'10" WT: 155lbsSeason W/L record (4-0) Returning to the mat is the undefeated Connor "The Pulverizer" Patricks. Pulverizer has won time and time again and today he says is no different, he plans on utilizing his leg locks and racking up the points like always. His opponent is newcomer Isaac "Hardcore" Hardy. Hardcore has a little wrestling background and says he's been eating right and focusing on the gym several times a week in preparation for today's bout. The two slam each other hard to the mat and quickly scramble to gain position. As promised, Pulverizer is relentless with his vicious leg locks but Hardcore's a scrappy fighter he manages to escape and shoves his balls right in his opponents face. After three grueling rounds, the points are tallied and the winner is rewarded with his well deserved victory fuck followed by giving the loser some post-orgasmic torment by tickling the hell out of him in bondage!
title: Isaac "Hardcore" Hardy vs Connor "The Pulverizer" Patricks
